english.segment1: Sometimes I just want to run away, From all the things you say to me, Feelings are ok to me..
english.segment2: And I just want to find a place, Where no one sleeps, we're all awake, And take the time to get away..
english.segment3: I don't want to play these games, Your strength has helped me make the change, Catch me if I fall from grace..
english.segment4: I don't want to play your games, 'Cause lonely was a safer place, Catch me if I fall from grace..
english.segment5: Take the time, to learn to breathe, 'Cause some day we're goin' under, When did we, all fall asleep?. Won't someone wake us?. Take the time, to learn to breathe, 'Cause some day we're goin' under, Help us see, what's underneath
english.segment6: I'm not here to place the blame, 'Cause although we're not, we're all the same, You lit a fire, when You called my name, uhh huh
english.segment7: I don't want to play your games, 'Cause lonely was a safer place, Catch me if I fall from grace, uhh huh
english.segment8: Take the time, to learn to breathe, 'Cause some day we're goin' under, When did we, all fall asleep?. Won't someone wake us?. Take the time, to learn to breathe, 'Cause some day we're goin' under, Help us see, what's underneath
english.segment9: I wanna take you, wanna shake you, Wanna make you feel like I do, I wanna take you, wanna break you, Wanna make you know what it's like
english.segment10: I wanna take you, wanna break you, Wanna make you, feel like I do, I wanna take you, wanna shake you, Wanna make you know what it's like
english.segment11: I won't fight you, I'm not like you, I wanna make you see what I see, I won't fight you, I'm not like you, I wanna make you feel like I do
english.segment12: I won't fight you, I'm not like you, I wanna make you see what I see, I won't fight you, I'm not like you, I wanna make you feel..like I feel
english.segment13: Take the time, to learn to breathe, 'Cause some day we're goin' under, When did we, all fall asleep?. Won't someone wake us?. Take the time, to learn to breathe, 'Cause some day we're goin' under, Help us see, what's underneath
english.segment14: You think you have it all figured out, You think you're onto something, I see you standing there, acting like you have. No idea what I'm talking about, You don't like the way I dress, You don't like the way I talk, That's fine, 'cause nobody asked you, And next time you want to point the finger. I suggest you look in the mirror,
